description: This PHP source file handles AJAX requests to change network configuration settings such as bridge mode and IGMP snooping. It updates device settings via setStr calls and returns JSON-encoded responses indicating the new state.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Sets the HTTP header to specify JSON content type.

methods.name: isset
methods.description: Checks if a POST variable is set.

methods.name: json_encode
methods.description: Encodes a PHP variable into JSON format.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets a device configuration parameter (external method).

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Gets a device configuration parameter (external method).
